github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Fixed slow API response times and optimized database queries.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Dekha, support tickets mein badta tha jab API speed kam ho jaata tha.  Need to monitor this closely.
github_commits.bug_related: This directly caused the increase in Support tickets related to slow application response times.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added caching layer to reduce database load.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Caching helped, but still need to optimize queries further.  Support team still reporting issues.
github_commits.bug_related: Caching didn't fully resolve the root cause, which was the inefficient database queries.  Support tickets remained high.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Performance issues - Yaar, speed kam ho raha hai!

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Performance issues pe kaam karna hai! API speed kam ho raha hai, sab support tickets mein aa rahe hai.

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Dekho, database queries bhi slow hain.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and database queries.  Aapka code dekhun.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Users ko bahut frustration hoga!

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Caching layer try karte hain.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Caching layer code complete. Let's deploy to staging.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decision to implement a caching layer to address performance issues.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning: Support tickets continue to pile up despite implementing caching. Root cause needs further investigation.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Subtle hint: Support team is still complaining about slow response times, suggesting the problem isn't fully solved.

jira_tickets.title: Optimize API Performance and Reduce Database Load
jira_tickets.description: Detailed description of performance issues, including slow API response times and inefficient database queries.  Impact: Increased Support tickets related to application responsiveness.  Priority: Medium.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Directly linked to the increase in Support tickets related to slow API response times and database query performance.

confluence_docs.title: Performance Optimization - Sprint 4
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Performance issues, including recommendations for caching, database query optimization, and monitoring.  Key Metrics: API Response Time, Database Query Execution Time, Support Ticket Volume.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 4 - Performance Improvement Plan
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the sprint planning meeting discussing the Performance issues and the plan to address them.  Attendees: Rahul, Priya, Amit, Arjun.
decisions_made: Implement caching layer as a priority.
Allocate 8 sprint points to performance optimization.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Referenced the TECH-401 ticket regarding the performance issues.
